biotools.summary: Fuzzy Quantification of Common and Rare Species in Ecological Communities (FuzzyQ) is an R package for fuzzy clustering of species in an ecological community as common or rare based on their abundance and occupancy. It also includes functions to compute confidence intervals of classification metrics and plot results.

bioschemas.name: FuzzyQ
bioschemas.summary: Fuzzy Quantification of Common and Rare Species in Ecological Communities (FuzzyQ) is an R package for fuzzy clustering of species in an ecological community as common or rare based on their abundance and occupancy. It also includes functions to compute confidence intervals of classification metrics and plot results.
